title: ST_KNN
description: Return true if geomA finds k nearest neighbors from geomB.
kernels:
  - returns: boolean
    args:
    - geometry
    - geometry
    - name: k
      type: integer
    - name: use_spheroid
      type: boolean
---

## Examples

```sql
SELECT * FROM table1 a JOIN table2 b ON ST_KNN(a.geom, b.geom, 5, false);
```
